Season Activity Ages Mid March thru Early May Youth Soccer - Spring Season PK-8th Grade April thru June Youth T-Ball PK-K April thru June Youth Baseball 1st-8th grade April thru June Youth Softball 1st-8th grade April thru June Rookie Ball 5 & 6 years 4 (2-week) sessions beginning early June Swimming Lessons Late May-Early July Swim Team Late August thru October Youth Soccer - Fall Season PK-8th Grade September thru Early November Youth Fall Volleyball 3rd-6th Grade November (3 Saturdays) Youth Basketball Clinic K-6th Grade December thru Early March Youth Basketball 1st-6th Grade Youth Sport Flyers Swim Lessons - Summer 2025 (PDF) Youth Schedules Soccer Fall 2025 Schedule: Pre-K & K Soccer Fall 2025 Schedule: 1st & 2nd Grade Soccer Fall 2025 Schedule: 3rd & 4th Grade Soccer Fall 2025 Schedule: 5th & 6th Grade Soccer Fall 2025 Schedule: 7th & 8th Grade Volleyball 2025 Schedule: 3rd & 4th Grade Volleyball 2025 Schedule: 5th & 6th Grade Youth Sports & Recreation Programs Soccer - Spring Season Youth Soccer (Spring 2025) Register Here Youth Soccer League - Spring 2025 (PDF) To provide an opportunity for girls and boys to play soccer in an organized, competitive, yet recreational setting. Emphasis is placed on fundamentals, teamwork, playing time, and sportsmanship. Registration & Fees Fee: $35.00 (includes team shirt) Deadline: Friday, February 7, 2025 Late Fee: $15.00 (applies after deadline) Refund Policy: No refunds after Friday, February 14, 2025 Scholarships: Available for those who apply before Monday, February 3, 2025 Eligibility & Divisions Age/Grade Requirements: Pre-Kindergarten: Must be 4 years old by February 7, 2025 Participants must register for the grade they are currently attending Players may move up one grade level if they meet minimum age/grade requirements Game Format & Divisions: Pre-K - Kindergarten (4v4) 1st & 2nd Grade (6v6) 3rd & 4th Grade (9v9) 5th & 6th Grade (9v9) 7th & 8th Grade (7v7 or 9v9, depending on number of participants) Game Information Schedule: Games will be played on Saturdays, starting March 22, 2025 Number of Games: 6-game schedule Game Locations: Pre-K - Kindergarten: De Soto ONLY 1st & 2nd Grade: De Soto ONLY 3rd - 8th Grade: De Soto, Eudora, Baldwin City, Gardner, or Wellsville How to Register Online Registration: here In-Person Registration: 32905 W. 84th Street, P.O. Box C, De Soto, KS 66018 Contact for Questions: Name: Justin Huslig Phone: (913) 586-5281 Email: jhuslig@desotoks.us Coaching Opportunities Interested in coaching? Sign up to be a head coach during registration. T-Ball Youth T-Ball (Summer 2025) Register Here Youth T-Ball - 4&5 Year Olds - Summer 2025 (PDF) To provide an opportunity for girls and boys to play T-Ball in an organized, recreational setting during the summer. Emphasis is placed on fundamentals, teamwork, playing time, and sportsmanship. Registration & Fees Fee: $40.00 (includes team shirt and hat) Deadline: Friday, February 28, 2025 Late Fee: $15.00 (applies after March 1, 2025) Refund Policy: No refunds after Friday, March 7, 2025 Scholarships: Available for those who apply before the registration deadline Equipment Assistance: Gloves, pants, and cleats are available upon request (limited sizes) Eligibility & Divisions Age Requirements: Open to 4 & 5-year-olds Participants must be 4 years old and not have turned 6 on or before August 31, 2025 Kindergarteners meeting this requirement are encouraged to play Rookie Ball (New Program) Game Information Schedule: Games begin the week of May 19, 2025 Game Days: Monday - Thursday (maximum of one game per week) Total Games: 5-game schedule Practice & Game Format: 15 minutes of practice followed by 45 minutes of game time Game Locations: All games will be played at De Soto Miller Park How to Register Online Registration: here In-Person Registration: 32905 W. 84th Street, P.O. Box C, De Soto, KS 66018 Contact for Questions: Name: Justin Huslig Phone: (913) 586-5281 Email: jhuslig@desotoks.us Coaching Opportunities Interested in coaching? Sign up to be a head coach during registration. Baseball Youth Baseball (Summer 2025) Register Here Youth Baseball - Summer 2025 (PDF) To provide an opportunity for boys to play baseball in an organized, competitive, yet recreational setting during the summer. Emphasis is placed on fundamentals, teamwork, playing time, and sportsmanship. Registration & Fees Fee: $80.00 (includes team shirt and hat) Deadline: Friday, February 28, 2025 Late Fee: $15.00 (applies after March 1, 2025) Refund Policy: No refunds after Friday, March 7, 2025 Scholarships: Available for those who apply before the registration deadline Equipment Assistance: Gloves, pants, and cleats are available upon request (limited sizes) Eligibility & Divisions Age Requirements: 7 & 8 Year Olds (Coach Pitch League) – Age as of May 1, 2025 (intended for 1st & 2nd grade ) 9 & 10 Year Olds – Age as of May 1, 2025 (intended for 3rd & 4th grade ) 11 & 12 Year Olds – Age as of May 1, 2025 (intended for 5th & 6th grade ) 13 thru 15 Year Olds – Age as of May 1, 2025 (intended for 7th & 8th grade ) Players may move up one age year if eligible Game Information Schedule: Games begin the week of May 19, 2025 Practices Begin: April 2025 Teams & Rosters Set: Mid-March Game Locations: League games may take place in Baldwin City, Eudora, Gardner, Spring Hill, Wellsville, and De Soto How to Register Online Registration: here In-Person Registration: 32905 W. 84th Street, P.O. Box C, De Soto, KS 66018 Contact for Questions: Name: Justin Huslig Phone: (913) 586-5281 Email: jhuslig@desotoks.us Coaching Opportunities Interested in coaching? Sign up to be a head coach during registration. Softball Youth Softball (Summer 2025) Register Here Youth Softball - Summer 2025 (PDF) To provide an opportunity for girls to play softball in an organized, competitive, yet recreational setting during the summer. Emphasis is placed on fundamentals, teamwork, playing time, and sportsmanship. Registration & Fees Fee: $80.00 (includes team shirt and hat) Deadline: Friday, February 28, 2025 Late Fee: $15.00 (applies after March 1, 2025) Refund Policy: No refunds after Friday, March 7, 2025 Scholarships: Available for those who apply before the registration deadline Equipment Assistance: Gloves, pants, and cleats are available upon request (limited sizes) Eligibility & Divisions Age Requirements: 8 & Under – Age as of January 1, 2025 (intended for 1st & 2nd grade) 10 & Under – Age as of January 1, 2025 (intended for 3rd & 4th grade) 12 & Under – Age as of January 1, 2025 (intended for 5th & 6th grade) 15 & Under – Age as of January 1, 2025 (intended for 7th & 8th grade) Players may move up one age year if eligible Game Information Schedule: Games begin the week of May 19, 2025 Practices Begin: April 2025 Teams & Rosters Set: Mid-March League games may take place in Baldwin City, Eudora, Gardner, Spring Hill, Wellsville, and De Soto How to Register Online Registration: here In-Person Registration: 32905 W. 84th Street, P.O. Box C, De Soto, KS 66018 Contact for Questions: Name: Justin Huslig Phone: (913) 586-5281 Email: jhuslig@desotoks.us Coaching Opportunities Interested in coaching? Sign up to be a head coach during registration. Rookie Ball Youth Rookie Ball (Summer 2025) Register Here Youth Rookie Ball - 5&6 Years Old - Summer 2025 (PDF) To provide an opportunity for girls and boys to play Rookie Ball in an organized, recreational setting during the summer. Emphasis is placed on fundamentals, teamwork, playing time, and sportsmanship. Registration & Fees Fee: $60.00 (includes team shirt and hat) Deadline: Friday, February 28, 2025 Late Fee: $15.00 (applies after March 1, 2025) Refund Policy: No refunds after Friday, March 7, 2025 Scholarships: Available for those who apply before the registration deadline Equipment Assistance: Gloves, pants, and cleats are available upon request (limited sizes) Eligibility & Divisions Age Requirements: Open to 5 & 6-year-olds Participants must be 5 years old and not have turned 6 on or before August 31, 2025 1st graders who meet this requirement are encouraged to play baseball or softball Game Information Schedule: Games begin the week of May 19, 2025 Game Days: Monday - Thursday (maximum of two games per week) Total Games: 8-game schedule Format: Hybrid T-Ball / Coach Pitch league for more experienced players transitioning to coach pitch Pitching Rules: Players get 3 pitches per at-bat, followed by hitting off the tee if needed Game Locations: All games will be played at De Soto Miller Park How to Register Online Registration: here In-Person Registration: 32905 W. 84th Street, P.O. Box C, De Soto, KS 66018 Contact for Questions: Name: Justin Huslig Phone: (913) 586-5281 Email: jhuslig@desotoks.us Coaching Opportunities Interested in coaching? Sign up to be a head coach during registration. Swim Lessons Swim Lessons Session #1 : June 2-13 Session #2 : June 16-27 Session #3 : July 7-18 Session #4 : July 21-August 1 Fee: $40 Swim Team Coming soon. Soccer - Fall Season Youth Soccer Fee: $35 Boys and girls in Pre-K through 8th grade Six-game schedule starts September 6th Practice starts late August Fall 2025 registration is due Friday, July 25th. Volleyball Youth Volleyball Fee: $40 Boys and girls in 3rd through 6th grade Eight-match schedule starts September 4th Practice starts late August Fall 2025 registration is due Friday, July 25th. Basketball Clinic Coming soon. Basketball Coming soon. Schedules: Youth Basketball - Tiny Basketball 1st & 2nd Grade (PDF) Youth Basketball - 3rd & 4th Girls (PDF) Youth Basketball - 3rd & 4th Boys (PDF) Youth Basketball - 5th & 6th Girls (PDF) Youth Basketball - 5th & 6th Boys (PDF) Adult Programs and Activities Yoga Yoga Register Here Yoga - August & September 2025 (PDF) Take an hour out of your busy schedule to re-set. This class allows the body to detox, restore oxygen to muscle tissue, align the spine, and rejuvenate as a whole. Open to all fitness and yoga skill levels. Registration & Fees Fee Per Month: August: $12 (Tuesdays or Thursdays) September: $9 (Tuesdays or Thursdays) Schedule & Location Dates: August Sessions: Tuesdays: Aug. 5th-26th Thursdays: Aug. 7th-28th September Sessions: (No class on Sept. 2nd & 4th) Tuesdays: Sept. 9th-23rd Thursdays: Sept. 11th-25th Time: 6:30pm-7:30pm Location: De Soto Community Center - 32905 W. 84th St. Instructor Instructor: Allison Block Certification: Yoga Teaching Certificate (Spring 2021) Experience: Introduced to yoga in 2015, trained in Vinyasa style but also teaches Hatha and Adaptive yoga. Equipment Some exercise equipment is provided. Participants are encouraged to bring their own yoga gear. Specialty equipment is not provided. How to Register Online Registration: here In-Person Registration: 32905 W. 84th Street, P.O. Box C, De Soto, KS 66018 Contact for Questions: Name: Justin Huslig Phone: (913) 586-5281 Email: jhuslig@desotoks.us Pickleball Open Gym Pickleball Looking for a place to stay active year-round? Join us for Open Gym at the De Soto Community Center! Schedule: Tuesdays: 8:30 AM - 11:00 AM Thursdays: 8:30 AM - 11:00 AM Sundays: 6:00 PM - 8:00 PM Fee $1 per day (pay at the door) Location De Soto Community Center: 32905 W. 84th Street, De Soto, KS 66018 How to Participate No registration is required. Simply show up during Open Gym hours and pay the daily fee.
